function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between cold, dry conditions and influenza mortality in New York City","Impact":"Increased risk of influenza mortality due to environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Improving indoor environmental conditions and controlling humidity levels","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitors, humidity control systems","People":"Residents of New York City","Owner":"City health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of indoor data on humidity and influenza transmission","Impact":"Inability to accurately assess and mitigate indoor transmission of influenza","Mitigation":"Increasing availability of indoor environmental data and conducting more studies on indoor conditions","Technologies":"Indoor environmental sensors, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on outdoor measures of temperature and humidity","Impact":"Limited understanding of the relationship between outdoor and indoor conditions for influenza transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies on indoor environmental conditions and their impact on influenza transmission","Technologies":"Indoor environmental sensors, data collection and analysis tools","People":"Epidemiologists, public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions"}]}
